game.name: Normis Simulator
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Playing as Normis, you are a typical representative of the mainstream with a traditional stable life, ironically referring to youth subcultures, avoiding conflicts and extreme actions, preferring routine and social adaptation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Playing as Normis, you are a typical representative of the mainstream with a traditional stable life, ironically referring to youth subcultures, avoiding conflicts and extreme actions, preferring routine and social adaptation.
